description: Trifold sheet from fashion periodical (P.15,434); at left are two round ornamental objects in black and white; in the center a woman in a white gown dotted with yellow flowers reading a book; on the right a man in a military costume with white breeches, a black coat with red piping and gold buttons, and a black hat
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Fashion plate from Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Quatrième Année, Trentième Cahier, 1 Octobre 1789
